reviewText: I love this sweet and simple story of a handsome cat who is cherished and respected.  The art work elegantly and skillfully renders the drama, and the musical score is incredibly beautiful.  I bought it for my grand-daughter, who is sure to enjoy watching and listening to it again and again.  I have gotten to know the complex and brave Herschel and the sensitive people who care for him. You can almost touch his soft fur and hear his thoughts throughout this tale!
This is a must-buy. The artwork is fantastic, even for people not into cats. The reader does a wonderful job, and it is a heartwarming story.
